data.text:
@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Just passing this on to the parents out there. This is from NBC news not some anti vax website.

https://t.co/v2FL9BsjqF

@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Welp… if you’re not going to answer here in this public forum, I guess I’ll have print the Pfizer pages and come ask you in person.
That’ll be fun you guys probably.
@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Why were the post-booster doses hospitalizations so high between December 14, 2020 and Febraury 27th, 2022? https://t.co/fxn5cykyL0 https://t.co/aCVwveyXqL
@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Covid deaths for the Omicron wave are very telling.  Why so many? It's less sever? https://t.co/ml1FCO029s

@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Will you be informing them of the Pfizer data release with 9 pages of potential adverse reactions? Or that Pfizer tried to hide said data for 75 years? Or that the package inserts are intentionally blank? 
CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY.
